attractNewCustomersToYourRestaurant: Attract new customers to your restaurant

first.first-description-0: Paprika enriches your experience in visiting restaurants and ordering food. You can book a table at your favorite restaurant and deliver your delicious meals to you on time.
first.first-description-1: Look up the best restaurant of your choice. You can find restaurants which play the music you like and serve the food you want, get their news, and a lot more.
first.first-description-2: View restaurants' menus, with images, description, prices, and customer rates.
first.first-description-3: With Paprika Inside, you will have a much better time when visiting you favorite restaurant.

third.aboutUsDescription: For some, it is just a normal business or application, but for us it is a passion to change the pattern of dealing with and within restaurants, and an inspiration to create a unique experience of enjoying a meal or an evening.

fourth.title: What Paprika can do for you?
fourth.discoverRestaurantsDescription: Search for new restaurants and view all of their details, like music, cuisine, menu, and customer reviews.
fourth.reservationDescription: Book a table at any time for you and your beloved ones in a restaurant of your choice.
fourth.pickupAndDeliveryDescription: Order food directly from the restaurant you prefer, and then you can pickup your order at any time or deliver it to you.
fourth.paprikaInsideDescription: Open, track your order, and view your invoice when you visit a restaurant.

fifth.getYourGuests: Get your guests to your front door.
fifth.todayItsEasyAndYouCanCancelAtAnyTime: today, it's easy and you can cancel at any time!
fifth.joinThePartner: Join the partner you need to help your

sixth.startSuccess: Start the success of your Business with us
sixth.weHaveALotOfRestaurants: We have a lot of great restaurants. Check them now.
